title: Smoked salmon flan with bechamel sauce
ingredients: ['For the bechamel sauce', '250g milk', '25g plain flour', '25g butter', 'salt, to taste', 'For the flan', 'breadcrumbs for the pan', '100g smoked salmon', '2 eggs', '2 teaspoons Dijon mustard', 'salt and pepper, to taste', 'lettuce leaves for garnish']
